content: the livorno court has issued a final ruling in a succession case they have declared the deceased persons succession and determined the entitlements of the parties involved the court has ordered the division of various properties including a marital residence and commercial properties among the parties one party has been ordered to pay a balance to the other party the court has also determined that each party should bear their own litigation costs the judgment was based on relevant provisions of the civil code and the civil procedure code the court rejected objections raised by one party and proceeded with the division of the estate they considered an expert report on the properties and made necessary allocations the court also addressed arguments regarding the right of habitation and use of the properties the surviving spouse has been assigned a larger share of the inheritance and the properties have been assigned accordingly the court has also ordered the reimbursement of expenses incurred in the division process
